title: Public Manners Foundations
summary: Transition skills toward the outdoors: polite doorways and early leash work outside.

lessons.title: Calm Doorways
lessons.objective: Wait calmly at doors before going through.
steps: Crack door open; if puppy stands, close gently and reset.
Release cue to go through when calm.
supportGuidelines: Reward calm focus at your side.
lessons.safetyNotes: Prevent door dashing with leash management.

lessons.title: Loose-Leash 2 — Outdoor Prep
lessons.objective: Take indoor leash manners to the backyard/quiet area.
steps: Reward every 1–2 steps at your side.
Keep sessions short; end before pulling begins.
supportGuidelines: If aroused: move back indoors to refresh success.
Use frequent turns to keep engagement.
lessons.safetyNotes: Choose safe footing and avoid busy times initially.

lessons.title: Leave-It — Food Level Up
steps: Drop a kibble covered by your shoe.
Mark and reward disengagement from your hand.
Progress to uncovered kibble with leash control.
supportGuidelines: Increase item value slowly (kibble → biscuit → cheese).
